00150 string Expr_instance::to_string() const
00151 {
00152     /* Save symbol's name. */
00153     string inst(i_symb->get_name());
00154 
00155     /* Save instance number. */
00156     inst.append("[");
00157     stringstream ins;
00158     ins << i_num;
00159     inst.append(ins.str());
00160     inst.append("]");
00161     inst.append(".");
00162 
00163     /* Save attribute's name. */
00164     inst.append(i_attr->get_name());
00165     return inst;
00166 }

00172 bool Expr_instance::equals_without_index(const Expr_instance *other) const
00173 {
00174     /* Save ins 1 */
00175     string inst1(i_symb->get_name());
00176     inst1.append(i_attr->get_name());
00177 
00178     /* Save ins 2 */
00179     string inst2(other->get_symb()->get_name());
00180     inst2.append(other->get_attr()->get_name());
00181 
00182     return inst1.compare(inst2) == 0;
00183 }
